pages.text: $(marked)Contracts$() are otherworldly pacts purchased from $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)$(marked)Demons$().$(br2)They can be signed with a $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)$(item)Taglock$(), after which using it will apply its conditions on whoever "signed" it.$(br2)While most contracts are usually signed in self-interest, some, like $(l:bewitchment:contracts/death)$(marked)Death$(), are best used on other people.

Contracts last $(marked)seven days$().$(br2)Always keep in mind that contracts, as demonic things do, are usually two sided, and will affect whoever signed them $(o)or forced them$().$(br2)$(o)Maybe attaining $(l:bewitchment:creatures/baphomet)someone$(/l)'s favor could negate that.$()
